name: Final Roulette
description: Set in futuristic Taiwan, you play as an investigative journalist who has been assigned the task of discovering what truly occurred on the day of “the accident.” On its opening day, a building full of the latest and upcoming technology was bombed. The bombs killed one innocent mother and injured dozens. At the start of the game, you are mysteriously trapped in an unknown area with the nine lead suspects. Over the course of four levels, you must solve increasingly difficult puzzles and interrogate unique suspects in order to discover who placed the bombs. This is your only hope of escape.
